attributes.action: Petition for the removal of Clearblue plus/easy tests from the market
attributes.additional_details:
How many of you women have used a Clearblue Plus pregnancy test and got a line?? You get excited and tell your family just to find out it's a faulty test, or a false positive or even an evap within the time limit.

    Well this happened to me yesterday. What do Clearblue do about it?? They send you a digital test, well i'm sorry Clearblue, this isnt good enough. So i'm here to ask all you women to sign my petition and say NO MORE!!!!
